title: Web-Based Language Education Technology Integration Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and foundational understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules and smartphone-centric accessible educational environment for working professionals.

learning_goals: Plan web-based language education content by applying the 6 stages of the PINTARR model (Preparation, Isolation, Transformation, Action, Reflection, Revision)
Effectively integrate web technologies during learner analysis, curriculum design, and assessment strategy development
Design language teaching-learning scenarios and produce project outcomes using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
